resource.name: Personal Income Tax Statistics By Zip Code
resource.description: This dataset contains data from California resident tax returns filed with California adjusted gross income and self-assessed tax listed by zip code.  This dataset contains data for taxable years 1992 to the most recent tax year available.

resource.name: C-8A And C-8B, Tax Liability By State Net Income Class, C And S Corporations
resource.description: This dataset contains tax liability data identified by C and S corporations within ranges of state net income.
columns_name: Net Income Less Net Loss Cum Percent
Cum Percent Of Returns With SNI
Net Income Less Net Loss Percent
columns_description: Taxable year for which tax returns were filed in a number format that can be used to filter and sort, as well as display in charts.
Cumulative percent of returns with tax assessed.
Percent of returns with tax assessed.
Total tax assessed before credits.
The cumulative percent of returns with positive net income (net income less net loss).
Amount of net positive income (net income less net loss) reported on returns filed.
The cumulative percent of returns with state net income.
The percent of returns with state net income.
Percent of returns with net positive income (net income less net loss).
Identifies C and S corporations.
The number of returns filed with state net income.

resource.name: B-7, Adjusted Gross Income by County
resource.description: This dataset contains adjusted gross income class tax statistics for California personal income tax return data by county.
columns_description: Taxable year for which tax returns were filed in a number format that can be used to filter and sort, as well as display in charts.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'CA - Counties' (fs3r-2bk8) the point in column 'county_geo_reference' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.
Geographic Point in County used for mapping.
Longitude used for mapping.
Latitude used for mapping.
Total tax assessed before credits.
Total California adjusted gross income (AGI) reported.
Number dependents reported for all returns.
Number of all taxable returns.
Number of all joint taxable and nontaxable returns filed.
Number of all taxable and nontaxable returns filed.
Political and geographic subdivision area of California.
Category of taxpayers whose income falls within a specified adjusted gross income range.
The field is used to sort AGIC.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'CA - Zip Code Tabulation Areas' (wuf4-3eum) the point in column 'county_geo_reference' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'CA - Places KML' (svgd-j6jz) the point in column 'county_geo_reference' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

This column was automatically created in order to record in what polygon from the dataset 'California Places Boundaries' (8xky-9gpe) the point in column 'county_geo_reference' is located.  This enables the creation of region maps (choropleths) in the visualization canvas and data lens.

resource.name: B-3, Adjusted Gross Income with Accumulated Percentages
resource.description: This dataset includes adjusted gross income, taxable income, and total tax liability personal income tax Statistics for California resident tax returns by taxable year.
columns_description: Percentage of the number of returns within each AGIC out of the total number of returns.
Taxable year for which tax returns were filed in a number format that can be used for display in charts.
Percentage of the taxable liability amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable liability amount of all AGIC ranges.
Cumulative percentage of the number of returns within each AGIC out of the total number of returns.
Cumulative percentage of the percent of adjusted gross income.
Percentage of the taxable income amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable income amount of all AGI class ranges.
Cumulative percentage of the taxable income amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable income amount of all AGIC ranges.
Taxable liability amount of each AGIC range.
Adjusted Gross Income Category (AGIC) is the category of taxpayers whose income falls within a specified adjusted gross income range.
Number of returns filed.
Total California Adjusted Gross Income (AGIC) before California deductions.
Percentage of the adjusted gross income (AGI) amount out of the total adjusted gross income.
California taxable income amount of each AGIC range.
Percent	Cumulative percentage of the taxable liability amount within each AGIC range out of the total taxable liability amount of all AGIC ranges.
